Barefoot Networks | ONSITE Santa Clara, CA | Common Lisp programmer

Barefoot makes high-performance network router chips. We're looking for someone to help develop and maintain an internal design tool written in Common Lisp. Full time, stable company, and an opportunity to see how chips are designed. Some hardware design experience is a plus but not necessary. Contact info is in my profile. (Note: I am currently in this position as a part-time contractor. We're looking for someone to take over for me as a regular full time employee.)
